Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client

Interface HalApiClientBuilder

  • @ProviderType
public interface HalApiClientBuilder
    A fluent builder to create and customize HalApiClient instances for advanced integration or test scenarios.

    If you don't need any of the advanced customizations, you can simply use HalApiClient.create() or HalApiClient.create(HalResourceLoader) instead.

    HalApiClientBuilder instances shouldn't be re-used, as calling the build method may modify its state.

    See Also:
    HalApiClient, RhymeBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static HalApiClientBuilder create()
        Returns:
        a new HalApiClientBuilder to start building

      • withResourceLoader

        HalApiClientBuilder withResourceLoader​(HalResourceLoader resourceLoader)
        Parameters:
        resourceLoader - implements the actual loading (and caching) of JSON/HAL resources
        Returns:
        this

      • withMetrics

        HalApiClientBuilder withMetrics​(RequestMetricsCollector metricsSharedWithRenderer)
        A RequestMetricsCollector instance can be used to track all upstream resources that have been retrieved, and collect metrics and response metadata from the interaction with the proxy objects. This is only relevant for clients created by the Rhyme instance while handling an incoming request.

        If you only want to consume HAL APIs and not use Rhyme to render your responses, you don't need to worry about the RequestMetricsCollector.

        Parameters:
        metricsSharedWithRenderer - the same instance that will be used to create the AsyncHalResourceRenderer
        Returns:
        this

      • withReturnTypeSupport

        HalApiClientBuilder withReturnTypeSupport​(HalApiReturnTypeSupport additionalTypeSupport)
        Extend the core framework to support additional return types in your annotated HAL API interfaces. You can call this method multiple times if you want to register more than one extension.
        Parameters:
        additionalTypeSupport - extension to the default type support
        Returns:
        this

      • withAnnotationTypeSupport

        HalApiClientBuilder withAnnotationTypeSupport​(HalApiAnnotationSupport additionalTypeSupport)
        Extend the core framework to support additional annotation types in your annotated HAL API interfaces. You can call this method multiple times if you want to register more than one extension.
        Parameters:
        additionalTypeSupport - extension to the default type support
        Returns:
        this

      • withObjectMapper

        HalApiClientBuilder withObjectMapper​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
        Replace the default Jackson ObjectMapper used for JSON deserialization with a customized instance. Note that this object mapper is only used when converting JSON to Java Objects. It's not used when the raw JSON response from an upstream service is parsed.
        Parameters:
        objectMapper - a configured ObjectMapper instance (which can be a single shared instance)
        Returns:
        this

      • withRemoteResourceOverride

        <T> HalApiClientBuilder withRemoteResourceOverride​(String entryPointUri,
                                                   Class<T> halApiInterface,
                                                   Function<RequestMetricsCollector,​T> factoryFunc)
        Defines an override that will make HalApiClient.getRemoteResource(String, Class) return a custom implementation for a specific combination of entry point URI and interface class (rather than the default dynamic proxy). This can be used to mock/stub remote resources in unit and integration tests, or to delegate remote resource proxy creation for a specific service to a completely different Rhyme or HalApiClient instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the HalApiInterface type
        Parameters:
        entryPointUri - the URI for which the override will be used
        halApiInterface - an interface defining the HAL API for that URI
        factoryFunc - a function that will create a proxy, stub or server-side implementation of the given interface
        Returns:
        this

      • build

        HalApiClient build()
        Returns:
        the new HalApiClient instance
